items.sentence: I can\'t understand why Tom doesn\'t want to go with us.
Tom was lucky that he didn\'t get hurt more than he did.
Tom was sick, so he couldn\'t come to my birthday party.
I wonder if Tom really wanted to go to Boston with Mary.
Don\'t you think we should\'ve talked to Tom about this?
Don\'t you want to know why I didn\'t do what you asked?
Tom didn\'t have the courage to do what he wanted to do.
Today is Monday, so I\'ll do what I always do on Monday.
Tom accepted Mary\'s invitation to have dinner with her.
I think you\'re the most beautiful girl I\'ve ever seen.
Tom Jackson\'s obituary said that he was born in Boston.
Just be thankful you don\'t have all of Tom\'s problems.
We arrived at the airport three hours before our flight.
When making a cake, you must use eggs, butter and sugar.
Would you mail this letter for me on your way to school?
Tom met Mary at a party, and it was love at first sight.
Tom might have eaten the stew if it had been less salty.
Tom never talks about what he wants to do in the future.
Tom picked up a book, opened it, and started reading it.
Tom picked up the coins that had fallen behind the sofa.
Tom put a bag of shredded cheese into his shopping cart.
I know you\'re probably mad about what I said yesterday.
I can\'t imagine anyone wanting to see that movie twice.
I can\'t keep this watch. I have to give it back to Tom.
Tom remembered that Mary and John had tried to kill him.
Tom thinks that the world is getting worse all the time.
I think Tom isn\'t likely to go to Boston any time soon.
Tom began trombone lessons when he was twelve years old.
Common sense tells me that this isn\'t the way to do it.
Tom doesn\'t want to spend the rest of his life in jail.
Tom doesn\'t wash his hair as often as Mary washes hers.
Tom doesn\'t wash the dishes. He leaves that up to Mary.
I didn\'t start out thinking I\'d go into show business.
Girls’ shirts can cost up to 13% more than boys’ shirts.
You\'re doing exactly what you\'re supposed to be doing.
According to Tom\'s doctors, his condition is incurable.
Although Tom is sick, he\'s planning on going to school.
I think that neither of those things is going to happen.
I think there are a lot of beautiful women in Australia.
We have a lot of equipment that no one knows how to use.
Tom certainly wasn\'t at home when we went to visit him.
Tom hasn\'t slept at all since the day before yesterday.
Tom wrote Mary\'s phone number in his little black book.
Tom\'s eyes gradually became accustomed to the darkness.
Tom\'s family disapproved of his relationship with Mary.
Tom\'s parents returned a day early from their vacation.
Tom\'s son was killed in a traffic accident last winter.
You\'re never going to find a better boyfriend than Tom.
Excuse me, but could you tell me the way to the station?
Tom didn\'t tell me that what we were doing was illegal.
